page.title: 05LAW & ORDER IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {HEADQUARTERS.}Newbury police part of Thames Valley force,H.Q.at Kidlington,Oxford. {COMMUNITY POLICING}2 officers police area,1 urban,1 rural using cycles & panda cars.Contact with Newbury Police Station by 2 way radio.Close contact with local schools to prevent crime.Many police live locally in police houses. {CRIMES:}Mainly thefts of & from cars,house burglaries,some vandalism.Less crime in rural areas,perhaps because of closer community spirit. {ACCIDENTS.}Police often called to acciidents on local major roads.
